 2010-12652010-10-21,  CITIZENSHIP,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS to increase the minimum investment amount under the Immigrant Investor Program (IIP) to $800,000 and the personal net worth amount to $1.6 M for Investor class applicants.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0218 Publication Date: 2010-11-10
